body.name: Broom and Dustpan Set for Home, 180° Rotating Broom Combo, Stand Up Dust Pans with Long Handle, Broom and Dustpan Combo Set for Office Kitchen Lobby Floor Cleaning (Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: [High-quality Material] This floor broom squeegee dustpan set is efficient to clean the floor. The handle is made of premium stainless steel material; broom head and dustpan made of PP and PET material; the squeegee is made of soft silicone material. Soft bristle broom and squeegee will not leave scratches to the floor. Durable and portable for daily cleaning.

[Suitable Size] The broom head size is 27×11.5cm with a total height of 93.5cm; The dustpan head size is 24.5×25 ×7.5cm with a total height of 84.5cm; the floor squeegee head size is 38 × 4cm with a total height of 106cm. Suitable size enables easy to clean dust and litter. And the proper height meets daily cleaning height needs, it is convenient to use reducing back or joint pain.

[180°Rotating Head Design] The head of broom, dustpan and squeegee features a 180°rotating connector joint making it flexible clean floor, bottom of the sofa, bed bottoms, etc. And the elastic bristles will effectively catch fine dust particles, pet hair and more. The dustpan head is rotatable for easily vertical storage. And the squeegee can be used for easier remove stagnant water and kitchen grease.

[Comb Teeth Design]This dustpan is equipped with comb teeth that provide a convenience for removing pet hair, long hair, etc. Push the broom through the teeth, the hair and pet hair will fall into the dustpan. No need to remove entangled hair and dust of the broom bristle by hands. Practical and free your hands completely.

[Foldable and Upright Design] This dustpan can be easily to fold 90°and stand upright prevents rubbish from falling out while moving rubbish. And it easy to storage without takes up much space. Also, the dustpan handle features a clip for the broom.
body.description: Parts List:1 × Broom (Rotatable) 1 × Dustpan (Rotatable) 1 × Floor Squeegee (Rotatable)Highlight description:The floor broom squeegee dustpan set with comb teeth design which is foldable and 180 °rotating that is efficient to sweep the floor. Practical for daily use.Key Feature:Scratch Free: The broom bristle features soft bristle that is soft and flexible to clean the floor. And the squeegee is silicone material. Perfect for cleaning to the floor without scratches to the floor surface.Lightweight and Portable: The long-handled floor broom squeegee dustpan set is lightweight and portable which is effortless to use making cleaning easier. Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wouldn't recommend this flimsy broom. the joints unscrew as I was trying to sweep. The broom brush is also very small. And it's overpriced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Would not recommend
reviews.reviewText: This was the second broom/dustpan set I ordered through Amazon and actually just wanted to order an upright dustpan but couldn't find those sold singly so I chose this set and it is so cheaply made that the metal handle to the dustpan got severely dented when I accidentally stepped on it. But the broom is also very cheaply made and I would not recommend this set whatsoever. The bristles on the broom are so weak that they barely sweep up anything and I occasionally need to sweep up stuff from my carpet before vacuuming and this broom would not work for such a task. There again, bristles too week.
